component.name: Driver Pilot
component.summary: Smart GPU Driver Manager for Linux

description.p: Driver Pilot is the ultimate tool for managing graphics drivers on Linux, specifically designed for NVIDIA and AMD users who want a hassle-free experience. Whether you are a gamer, a developer, or just a daily user, Driver Pilot ensures your GPU runs at its best.

ul.li: Smart Express Install: Forget terminal commands. Our wizard analyzes your hardware and installs the perfect driver version automatically.
Live Performance Hub: Monitor your GPU temperature, VRAM usage, CPU load, and RAM stats in real-time with a modern, beautiful dashboard.
Laptop Mux Switch Control: Easily switch between Integrated (Intel) and Dedicated (NVIDIA) graphics to save battery or boost performance (Hybrid Graphics).
Safety First: Built-in system diagnostics and Timeshift snapshot integration ensure you can always revert changes if something goes wrong.
Gamer Friendly: One-click setup for Feral GameMode and Steam Flatpak fixes to optimize your gaming rig.

description.p: Driver Pilot handles the complexity of repositories, kernel modules, and secure boot signing behind the scenes, leaving you with a clean and powerful interface.
